alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Thomas; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:01PM EST until January 12 at 6:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cook County in south central Georgia... Western Berrien County in south central Georgia... Northern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Central Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Tift County in south central Georgia... * Until 645 PM EST. * At 601 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coolidge, or 12 miles southwest of Moultrie, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Moultrie, Adel, Sparks, Enigma, Norman Park, Lenox, Ochlocknee, Alapaha, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Berlin, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Eldorado, New Lois, Massee, and Greggs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Thomas; Tift
